General.Name: Beijing Kingfore HV & Energy Conservation Technology Co.Ltd.
General.Description: Kingfore Energy Group Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells energy saving products in China. It offers heating operation services and energy-saving renovation services. The company also provides climate compensators, flue gas waste heat recovery devices, district heating centralized monitoring systems, hydraulic balance diagnosis and control platform heating systems, wireless room temperature collectors, frequency conversion control equipment, boiler control cabinets, PLC control cabinets, deep recovery and utilization systems of heat pump flue gas waste heat, heat metering products, frequency conversion fan control cabinets, energy consumption collection systems, wireless temperature and pressure sensors, and IoT gateway systems. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Beijing, China.

3.Name: Ying  Fu
3.Title: Deputy Gen. Mang., Director and Board Sec.
